wheel down here: Scrolls down after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
wheel tiny down here: Scrolls tiny down after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
wheel up here: Scrolls up after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
wheel tiny up here: Scrolls tiny up after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
wheel left here: Scrolls left after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
wheel tiny left here: Scrolls tiny left after move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window
